Description: Dark green glass spindle-whorl or bead; conical or domical section with a narrow vertical perforation; made by trailing, possibly in a mould; current surface partly iridescent; signs of use on the perforation.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Horatio Herbert Kitchener, Earl Kitchener of Khartoum
Curator's comments: See Bailey, Op. Ath VI (1965), pp. 5-13 for details of the Hake-Kitchener excavations at Kourion.
Acquisition name: Transferred from: Victoria and Albert Museum
